description:
A thick layer of fresh snow provides loads of fun for Senko and Nakano. However, the mood changes when the mysterious stranger returns!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Nice to Let Your Inner Child Out Now and Then, Isn`t It?
Tama ni wa Doushin ni Kaeru no mo Yoi Jaro?
たまには童心に返るのもよいじゃろ?
